tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (2/3) In 1865, the consul general in Alexandria, Egypt reports: “The outbreak of the disease has nevertheless caused great alarm, and many persons have left the place…several [ships] have been charted for extra trips.” go.usa.gov/xvKs9 #FRUS #FSIatHome
